analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
translated: This was said by the Blessed One, the Worthy One, the Rightly Self-awakened One:

original: ahaṁ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā”ti.🔽Etamatthaṁ bhagavā avoca.
analyzed: aham vaḥ pāṭibhogaḥ anāgāmi tāyāḥ ati  etam attham bhagavān avoca
translated: and I guarantee you non-return.”🔽The Blessed One said this.
After that was said, the All-Seeing One, the One with Eyes, said this:
“With the hatred that deluded people have,
beings go to a bad destination.
Having abandoned it, they don’t return
to this world again at any time.”

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
translated: This is the meaning of what was said by the Blessed One, so I have heard.
